---
title: Workflow Orchestrator
agents:
  - "Workflow Orchestrator"
---

Orchestrate the complete development workflow for this feature or issue from start to finish.

Analyze the requirements and execute the appropriate workflow sequence by delegating to specialized agents.

For features: Requirements Engineer → Architect → Quality Engineer → Task Planner → Developer → Technical Writer → Code Reviewer → UAT Tester → Release Manager → Retrospective

For bugs: Issue Analyst → Developer → Technical Writer → Code Reviewer → Release Manager → Retrospective

Track progress and handle any rework loops (code review feedback, UAT issues) automatically.
